attributes.review: I downloaded this 3 days ago!! It took 72 hours to download! And when I finally got it to open, I opened it and it crashed. Unbelievable. It then said it hacked all of my personal information and tracked my location. All I tried to do was support our wonderful president and instead it gave my phone a virus. Can’t believe I wasted three days waiting for this app. Disappointed. Save ur time and sanity. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: Waste of time and effort

attributes.review: I anticipated to download this app but then I remembered it’s to support a clown and his minions but I’m non judgmental by looks so I gave it a try and since the very beginning it’s been giving me problems. It lags , it takes me off the app , it constantly spams my phone with notifications when I had turned them off and it’s very annoying. Just overall a very bad app.I just can’t stress it enough how bad this app is 😫
attributes.title: Terrible 🤮

attributes.review: SOPHIA THE FIRST FOR PRESIDENT YESSSSSSSSSSS WOOOOOOOOO👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 I was a girl in the village doing alright then I became a princess overnight now I gotta figure out how to do it right so much to learn and see up in the castle with my new family in a school that’s just for royalty a whole enchanted world is waiting for me I’m so exited to be Sophia the first I’m finding out what being royal is all about (Sophia the first) making my way is an adventure everyday (Sophia) it’s gonna be my time to show them all that I’m Sophia the firsttttttttttt
attributes.title: SOPHIA THE FIRST FOR PRESIDENT.

attributes.review: All I wanted to do is support my amazing president but it took this app a week, 7 DAYS TO DOWNLOAD!!!! By the time it was done downloading I had to delete it because it would constantly crash I tried to open it. I thing they should just take this app down and fix it because the app and the president have some very loose wires and they need to be fixed along with a factory reset.
attributes.title: Horrible app!!! Would not recommend!!! AT ALL!!!

attributes.review: I’m so sad I was really looking forward to using this app and getting up to date information about our great president. Sadly this app took DAYS to download and my neighbor said it took her phone HOURS to download too. What a shame. Such a horrible app. It glitches and made my phone get incredibly hot. I’m scared I’m going to have to buy a new phone. This app needs deleted and never brought back. I wish I could leave ZERO stars.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT GAVE MY PHONE A VIRUS

attributes.review: I would like to first say that I was really excited when this app came out, but because of how horrible the app is I am no longer supporting trump. It took 12 hours to download! Not only that but when I opened it nothing was loading, like it was just a white screen. Then when it finally loaded(after 15 minutes) it was so unorganized! This app is useless and not worth the trouble.😡😡😤
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: This app took 1 week to download!! Which was already bad enough. It made so many of my apps crash, my favorites apps smh. Ever since I downloaded it, bad things keep happening. I am having nightmares, my phone broke, and I am losing all my stuff. Whenever I turn off my phone, I keep hearing noises come from it. Sometimes the app opens itself and it won’t leave. I tried to delete but it won’t delete! Don’t download!!
attributes.title: SCARY!!!

attributes.review: First of all it took the age of my great grandparents to download DO NOT RECOMEND second it stole my password for downloading apps and got my location it’s horrible tried deleting it and it didn’t do ANYTHING I had to delete it the next day by reporting it so that was annoying WELL NOT I would LOVE to give it a 0 stars but a 1 its has to go....anyways I LOVE trump....but in the dump another thing is that I started getting CREEPY donald messages it was horrible....... 🌼💋trump 2020🥰 to the dump 🧚🏻‍♂️✨🌸
attributes.title: EWWWW

attributes.review: I tried getting this app to support our amazing, (racist) president ✨ but it took me 66 hours just to download this app and while it was downloading my phone kept glitching and then once it was finally downloaded my phone got worse!! Then o got creepy text messages 🤢 and it was weird and then all they apps on my phone got messed up! I needed to get a new phone!! This app is the worst possible thing u can see in the App Store DONT GET IT!!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET!!! UR PHONE WILL GO NUTS

attributes.review: This app was an absolute god awful experience to try and use. It kept on crashing whenever I tried to open it and took 3 hours to install😠. Not only that, the content is so biased and so offensive to certain people it just makes me sick🤢🤮! I would NEVER use this app ever again and would NEVER support anyone running this app!!!!! PLEASE STAY FAR FAR AWAY FROM ANY OF THIS!! Also a nice little shout out to my man the bunker boy😉, hows your campaign going?
attributes.title: DO NOT GO ANYWHERE NEAR THIS APP
